title: Straight-Through Invoice Processing
content: Hyprbots enables up to 80% straight-through invoice processing within 8 weeks, significantly reducing manual intervention and improving efficiency.

title: Intelligent Document Processing
content: Uses LLMs and transformer models to extract all relevant fields from invoices accurately, reducing the need for human validation.

title: AI-Led Capitalization and Amortization
content: Automates capitalization and amortization tasks, ensuring high accuracy and operational efficiency for finance teams.

title: AI-Powered Invoice Matching
content: Automatically matches invoices with purchase orders and delivery notes using AI algorithms, minimizing reconciliation errors.

title: Automated Tax Verification
content: Automatically verifies applicable sales tax on invoices based on item description and shipping address, ensuring tax compliance.

title: Automated Accruals
content: Books and reverses accruals for goods and services with pending invoices or approvals, reducing month-end workload.

title: Duplicate Invoice Detection
content: Identifies and flags duplicate or incomplete invoices, helping maintain data integrity and avoid double payments.

title: Accounts Payable Cost Optimization
content: Achieves over 80% cost optimization in AP processes by automating tasks like invoice processing, accruals, GL coding, and early payment recommendations.

title: Cash Outflow Reduction
content: Recommends optimal payment timings to leverage early payment discounts and delay non-critical payments, reducing up to 10% in cash outflow.

title: Vendor Satisfaction Enhancement
content: Provides vendors access to real-time invoice status via AI-assistant, promoting transparency and improving collaboration.

title: Audit Readiness and Compliance
content: Creates system-driven GL entries with detailed audit trails, leading to accurate financial books and enhanced audit readiness.

title: Zero System Integration Cost
content: Hyprbots is pre-integrated with popular ERP, CRM, and business platforms, reducing deployment friction and IT costs.

title: GL Code Recommendation
content: Recommends GL codes automatically for invoices using AI, ensuring consistency and speeding up accounting workflows.

title: Vendor Payment Timing Recommendation
content: Analyzes vendor terms to suggest early or delayed invoice payments, optimizing working capital.

title: Security and Data Privacy
content: Implements end-to-end encryption for data in transit and at rest. Offers role-based access control for secure data handling.

title: Compliance Certifications
content: Hyprbots is compliant with SOC 1 Type 2, SOC 2 Type 2, ISO27001, and GDPR, ensuring enterprise-grade security and data privacy.

title: Chat-Based Analytics Interaction
content: Supports ChatGPT-style conversational analytics, enabling users to query finance data using natural language.

title: Competitive Advantage
content: Compared to other vendors, Hyprbots offers higher accuracy, AI-first capabilities, and comprehensive automation with no need for rules-based systems.

title: Mission and Vision
content: Hyprbots aims to free humans from repetitive finance tasks by co-designing AI-assistants with CFOs across industries.

title: Deployment Philosophy
content: No custom IT project is required. Hyprbots assistants are ready-to-use and can be configured to suit customer-specific needs.
